src:
Pelatih Persipura Beber Kunci Kemenangan dari Madura United
04 Nov 2019, 09:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Jacksen Tiago membeber rahasia sukses timnya meraih hasil apik pada laga kontra Madura United. Pelatih Persipura Jayapura tersebut mengakui bahwa kemenangan tersebut tak lepas matangnya persiapan yang mereka lakukan sebelum laga ini.
"Kami sudah sepekan mempersiapkan diri di Surabaya. Ini untuk menghadapi beberapa situasi berbahaya yang ada di tim Madura," ucap Jacksen.
"Anak-anak akhirnya mampu mengantisipasi ancaman dari Madura, terutama dari Greg Nwokolo, Aleksandar Rakic, dan Andik Vermansah," sambungnya.
Menurut Jacksen, kemenangan anak asuhnya ini juga tak lepas dari disiplin para pemainnya. Boaz Solossa dan kawan-kawan pun dinilai mampu bermain dengan militan kala menghadapi Madura United.
"Kami apresiasi setinggi mungkin pada anak-anak. Selain itu, kami juga mengapresiasi Madura United yang membuat kita berjuang keras untuk bisa memenangi pertandingan," tuturnya.
Persipura sukses mengalahkan Madura United, pada laga pekan ke-26 mereka di Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019. Dalam pertandingan yang dihelat di Stadion Gelora Bangkalan, Minggu (03/11) tersebut, Mutiara Hitam menang dua gol tanpa balas.
Dengan kemenangan ini, Persipura kian merangsek ke papan atas. Mereka berada di peringkat tiga klasemen sementara, dengan raihan 43 poin dari 24 laga. Sementara, Madura United masih berada di posisi runner-up, dengan koleksi 44 angka dari 26 pertandingan.
Bagaimana tanggapan Jacksen soal peluang juara timnya? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Persipura Coach Beber Key to Victory from Madura United
Nov 04 2019, 09:33 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Jacksen Tiago revealed the secret of his team's success in achieving a slick result in the match against Madura United. Jayapura Persipura coach admitted that the victory could not be separated from the preparation they did before the fight.
"We have been preparing for a week in Surabaya. This is to face some dangerous situations that exist in the Madura team," said Jacksen.
"The children were finally able to anticipate threats from Madura, especially from Greg Nwokolo, Aleksandar Rakic, and Andik Vermansah," he continued.
According to Jacksen, the victory of the foster children is also inseparable from the discipline of the players. Boaz Solossa and his friends were considered capable of playing with militants when facing Madura United.
"We appreciate the highest possible for the children. In addition, we also appreciate Madura United which makes us fight hard to be able to win the game," he said.
Persipura successfully defeated Madura United, in their 26th week of action in Shopee Liga 1 of the 2019 season. In the match held at the Gelora Bangkalan Stadium on Sunday (11/03), the Black Pearl won two goals without reply.
With this victory, Persipura increasingly surged into the top flight. They are ranked third in the standings, with 43 points from 24 matches. Meanwhile, Madura United is still in the runner-up position, with a collection of 44 points from 26 matches.
What is Jacksen's response to the chance of his team champion? See below.
